title: Elden Ring Beats Horizon, Pokemon, and Dying Light 2 Sales - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.11.22
description:
Blessing is joined by Kotaku's Zack Zweizen to talk Elden Ring sales, Ikumi Nakamura's new studio, and more!  

Follow Zack Zweizen on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ZwiezenZ

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:00 - Zack Zwiezen is here!
00:07:36 - Housekeeping

We’ve got another Community podcast day! That’s where Greg takes over the Twitch stream to guest on community podcasts for the entire day. That’s happening right after today’s Games Daily on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames


Time Changes!

The Roper Report  -
00:09:21 - Elden Ring has beaten Horizon, Pokemon, and Dying Light 2 to become 2022’s best selling game
00:26:10 - Ikumi Nakamura has announced a new studio!
00:36:50 - Ads
00:41:01 - Russia Reportedly Legalizes Piracy of Games, Movies, and More
00:45:20 - Xbox is having an Indie Showcase Next Week
00:54:17 - Call of Duty: Warzone Is Officially Coming to Mobile
00:58:00 - Dead Space Remake Confirmed for Early 2023
00:58:58 - Out today
01:00:38 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
TUES: Snowbike Mike and Gary
WED: Blessing and Andy
THURS: Tam and Tim
FRI: Greg and Bless
